segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching high, and that stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my heart racing, hoping he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, trying to catch the cookies as he takes them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face, but it's so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why they didn't just ask for the cookies instead of risking it like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed, and it looks like it's about to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed them yet, standing right there in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking it, balancing like that on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get the cookies quickly and get down safely before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame him, like a picture of mischief and danger.
segments.speaker: PAR
